name: Craft Furnace
goal: Create a furnace for smelting ore and cooking food

steps.title: Craft Crafting Table
steps.details: If missing, craft a crafting_table first (requires 4 planks).

steps.title: Place Crafting Table
steps.details: Place crafting table nearby if not already placed. params: { "structure": "platform", "width": 1, "length": 1, "material": "crafting_table" }

steps.title: Craft Furnace
steps.details: Craft the furnace using the table.
